00014 ATimer::ATimer() {
00015        m_handleTimer = NULL;
00016

00019 ATimer::ATimer(xTimerHandle handleTimer) {
00020        Attach(handleTimer);
00021 }
00022 
00023 ATimer::~ATimer() {
00024        if ( IsValid() )
00025               Delete(portMAX_DELAY);
00026 }
00027 
00028 void ATimer::Callback(xTimerHandle xTimer) {
00029 
00030        static_cast<ATimer *>(pvTimerGetTimerID(xTimer))->OnExpired();
00031 }
00032 
00033 ATimer &ATimer::Create(const signed char *pcTimerName, portTickType xTimerPeriod, unsigned portBASE_TYPE uxAutoReload){//, void * pvTimerID, tmrTIMER_CALLBACK pxCallbackFunction) {
00034        assert(!IsValid());
00035 
00036        xTimerHandle handle;
00037        handle = xTimerCreate(pcTimerName, xTimerPeriod, uxAutoReload, this, ATimer::Callback);
00038        if (handle != NULL)
00039               Attach(handle);
00040 
00041        return *this;
00042 }
00043 
00044 void ATimer::Attach(xGenericHandle handle) {
00045        assert(handle != NULL);
00046 
00047        if (IsValid()) {
00048               Delete(portMAX_DELAY);
00049        }
00050        m_handleTimer = handle;
00051 }
00052 
00053 portBASE_TYPE ATimer::Delete(portTickType xBlockTime) {
00054        portBASE_TYPE res = pdTRUE;
00055        if (m_handleTimer != NULL) {
00056               res = xTimerDelete(m_handleTimer, xBlockTime);
00057               if (res != pdTRUE)
00058                      m_handleTimer = NULL;
00059        }
00060 
00061        return res;
00062 }
